IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE PURPOSES OF THE FOUNDATION ARE TO FOSTER PUBLIC UNDERSTANDING OF, AND SUPPORT FOR, FORSYTH TECHNICAL COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND TO SOLICIT AND PROMOTE DONATIONS OF ANY KIND FOR THE EXCLUSIVE BENEFIT OF THE COLLEGE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSES OF THE FOUNDATION ARE TO FOSTER PUBLIC UNDERSTANDING OF, AND SUPPORT FOR, FORSYTH TECHNICAL COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND TO SOLICIT AND PROMOTE DONATIONS OF ANY KIND FOR THE EXCLUSIVE BENEFIT OF THE COLLEGE.
IRS990.Desc: VARIOUS ENDOWMENTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO STUDENTS AT FORSYTH TECHNICAL COMMUNITY COLLEGE TO HELP FINANCE THEIR HIGHER EDUCATION AND ENHANCE THE COMMUNITY THROUGH THIS EDUCATION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CONTRIBUTIONS TO FORSYTH TECHNICAL COMMUNITY COLLEGE FOR THE SUPPORT OF THEIR OVER 275 (247 CURRICULUM) EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS PROVIDED TO OVER 11,000 CREDIT STUDENTS AND 9,000 CORPORATE AND CONTINUING EDUCATION STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF 59 INDIVIDUAL DONOR-RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS AND 1 QUASI-ENDOWMENT ESTABLISHED FOR A VARIETY OF PURPOSES.

IT IS THE FOUNDATION'S POLICY TO EVALUATE ALL TAX POSITIONS TO IDENTIFY ANY THAT MAY BE CONSIDERED UNCERTAIN. ALL IDENTIFIED MATERIAL TAX POSITIONS ARE ASSESSED AND MEASURED BY A MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THRESHOLD TO DETERMINE IF THE TAX POSITION IS UNCERTAIN AND WHAT, IF ANY, THE EFFECT OF THE UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION MAY HAVE ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS WERE IDENTIFIED FOR 2023 AND 2022.
INVESTMENT EXPENSES INCLUDED IN REVENUE ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS -42,806.
LAND SALE EXPENSES NOT INCLUDED IN REVENUE ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS -17,945.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART V, ENDOWMENT FUNDS, LINE 1G COLUMN (E), AND LINE 1A COLUMN (D)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUR YEARS BACK END OF YEAR BALANCE ON LINE 1G COLUMN (E) DOES NOT AGREE TO THE THREE YEARS BACK BEGINNING OF YEAR BALANCE ON LINE 1A COLUMN (D). THE THREE YEARS BACK BEGINNING OF YEAR BALANCE ON LINE 1A COLUMN (D) WAS ADJUSTED TO INCLUDE ACCUMULATED ENDOWMENT EARNINGS NOT PREVIOUSLY INCLUDED IN THIS RECONCILIATION.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: GRANTS TO FORSYTH TECHNICAL COMMUNITY COLLEGE FACULTY AND STAFF
GRANTS TO SMALL BUSINESSES IN FORSYTH COUNTY, NC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES GRANTS ONLY TO A RELATED ORGANIZATION, FORSYTH TECHNICAL COMMUNITY COLLEGE. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO MAKES GRANTS TO SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS IN FORSYTH COUNTY, IN KEEPING WITH THE COLLEGE'S PROGRAMMING AND MISSION. THE SMALL BUSINESS CENTER NETWORK USES A CLIENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM TO FOLLOW UP WITH CLIENTS WHO HAVE RECEIVED GRANT FUNDS. THE DETAILS OF USE AND THE ADDED IMPACT THAT RESULTED FROM THE USE OF THE FUNDS IS RECORDED THREE AND SIX MONTHS AFTER RECEIVING THE FUNDS, IF NOT MORE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN ELECTRONIC COPY OF THE FULL FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE ENTIRE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, ALL OFFICERS AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT, WHICH INCLUDES MAKING A WRITTEN DISCLOSURE TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION AND THE CHAIR OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF ALL POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION WILL ALSO REVIEW ALL DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS COMPLETED BY KEY EMPLOYEES AND THE CHAIR OF THE BOARD WILL REVIEW ALL DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS COMPLETED BY DIRECTORS AND THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FOUNDATION TO DETERMINE APPROPRIATE RESOLUTION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
